title: Nemesis Draft not tracking Kills/Minions Slain/Wins
body:
So before i played a round of the new Nemesis Draft i was at 190 Kills on my profile, After the match it still had the same stats. Since it's classed as a Normal game in Match History shouldn't it track stats like regular Ranked/Normal matches do?

You can clearly see i got kills to justify that it should have updated:
http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/OC1/78911860/200415394?tab=overview

*Yeah, Fed AD Janna wrecks shop...*

replies.body: I thought they just didn't include kills in featured game modes. You'd get an insane amount if the kills you got from URF mode were included.
